scenario.name: Missing transaction identifier
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK From: "[$display_test]" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]:[local_port]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Accept: application/sdp CSeq: 1 OPTIONS Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: [$display_test] Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: 1 ACK Subject: [$display_test] Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: 1 ACK Subject: [$display_test] Content-Length: 0
